## Task Manager App Completed

Your task manager app has been created with all the requested features:

✅ **Register** - Users can create new accounts
✅ **Login** - Authentication system with validation
✅ **Dashboard** - Clean interface showing all tasks
✅ **Add/Edit/Delete Tasks** - Full CRUD operations
✅ **Search & Filter** - Find tasks by title/description and filter by status
✅ **Logout** - Secure logout functionality
✅ **Responsive & Attractive UI** - Modern, mobile-friendly design

## Getting Started

1. Install dependencies: `npm install`
2. Start development server: `npm run dev`
3. Open your browser and start managing tasks!

The app uses local storage for data persistence, so your data will be saved between sessions.
